title: A Path to Purpose
description: Losing a loved one is never easy. The pain of loss can be overwhelming and cause us to make some bad decisions. David loses his father as a teen and never finds closure. As an adult another loss is simply too much for David and he takes his own life. Following his suicide, the journey he is taken on is enlightening, life-changing and comforting. This book is a must read for anyone fighting the emptiness of a lost loved one and needs to replenish their hope in finding happiness and closure.
author: Artie Leary
